page.title: 04SHOPPING TRENDS IN GOOLE
page.content: 60{families}were surveyed to determine how often and which Goole shops they use.75% used a large supermarket once a week.70% used the nationwide chain stores 2 or 3 times a week and 60% used the small local shops more than 3 times a week. All the families shopped out of Goole at least once a month. Doncaster was the most popular town visited.Clothes, toys and electrical goods were the main goods bought out of Goole. A{shopping survey}of 85 people in Goole{market}showed that 90% visited the market once or twice a week.62% came from Goole and 38% from out of town.60% came to buy food,30% to buy clothes and 10% to buy other things. 60% spent less than Â£5 and only 10% spent more than Â£10.
